r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.8M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with UNIVERSITY OF REGINA. The average
  contract duration was 0.54 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $386.8K.
  The longest contract was 4.85 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $12.5M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.8M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '35'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '6%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '53%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.5'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '2.5M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '0.54'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '386.8K'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '4.85'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '12.5M'
